title: NGS Sequencing
description: Common properties for NGS Sequencing sxperiments.

sequencer_platform.description: Sequencer Model, e.g. HiSeq 2500, NextSeq, NovaSeq.

library_vendor_kit.description: Vendor for the library construction kit, e.g. KAPA

library_kit_lot.description: Lot number for the library construction kit

paired_end_reads.description: Indicate if the sequencing was performed paired or single ended

read_length.description: Number of cycles for each sequencing read

input_ng.description: Amount of DNA/RNA (in ng) used for library construction

library_yield_ng.description: Resulting yield (in ng) from library construction

average_insert_size.description: The average insert size for the library
